title: The Secret Society Of The Mad Hatters #44 Sneak Preview:  Fireworks With Comedian Matt Gallagher
description: Thank you for tuning in for another Secret Society of The Mad Hatters. Trust me this episode is pure fireworks! The boys welcome comedian Matt Gallagher to the show to debate the Trump administration, Right vs Left and how to save the planet all while Off The Grid Ryan giggles!  It’s always a pleasure to talk politics with my brotha from another mother!
itunes:author: Sam Tripoli
